snippet: The city, straining to manage its debts and meet its payroll, may be nearing circumstances dire enough to require the state to step in, Michigan officials warned.
abstract: Michigan officials warn that City of Detroit, straining to manage its debts and meet its payroll, may be nearing circumstances dire enough to require a state-appointed emergency financial manager.
lead_paragraph: The city, straining to manage its debts and meet its payroll, may be nearing circumstances dire enough to require the state to step in, Michigan officials warned.

headline.seo: Detroit Faces Threat of State-Appointed Emergency Financial Manager

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject
